title: Web Development Certification
desc: Completed the full-stack web development curriculum covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and databases. Built multiple projects including responsive websites, APIs, and full-stack applications.

title: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
desc: Mastered fundamental programming concepts including variables, arrays, objects, loops, and functions. Completed challenges on basic algorithm scripting, object-oriented programming, and functional programming.

title: Front End Development Libraries
desc: Learned modern front-end libraries including Bootstrap, jQuery, SASS, React, and Redux. Built interactive user interfaces and single-page applications with responsive design principles.

title: Back End Development and APIs
desc: Developed server-side applications using Node.js and Express. Created RESTful APIs, worked with databases, and implemented authentication and security best practices.

title: Data Visualization Certification
desc: Learned to create dynamic and interactive data visualizations using D3.js. Built charts, graphs, and dashboards to present complex data in an understandable format.

title: Responsive Web Design
desc: Mastered responsive web design principles using HTML5 and CSS3. Created mobile-first designs that work seamlessly across all device sizes and screen resolutions.

title: Python for Everybody
desc: Completed comprehensive Python programming course covering basic syntax, data structures, web scraping, databases, and data visualization. Built practical applications using Python libraries.

title: Git and GitHub Mastery
desc: Learned version control with Git and collaboration using GitHub. Mastered branching, merging, pull requests, and best practices for team development workflows.
